Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUIView.controllers

Class ChooseAssistantController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUIView.controllers.ChooseAssistantController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController
public class ChooseAssistantController extends Object implements GUIController
ChooseAssistantController class is a controller, it is used to visually display Assistant cards and to handle the choice of one of them
